voice_instruct: Young man, mid-20s, bright tenor with infectious charisma. Brandon Flowers' anthemic confidence meets Bruno Mars' funky showmanship. Voice radiates golden-boy energy but carries surprising emotional depth. Capable of soaring pop-rock belting that drops into tight funk vocal grooves. Warm, genuine, occasionally devastating.

tracks.title: Duelist
tracks.prompt: pop-rock funk disco fusion, verse: The Killers anthemic guitar riff with Nile Rodgers funk guitar scratching, 120 BPM danceable, clap-snare backbeat, male vocals charismatic and confident, chorus: full Daft Punk disco groove with vocoder harmonies and arena rock power chords, horn stabs and synth bass, energetic and triumphant
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Shardplate gleaming in the afternoon,
Ten duels deep and I'm coming for the boon,
Every stance a dance, every strike a beat,
Windstance, Smokestance, move your feet,
They call me prince but I prefer the ring,
Where reputation isn't everything,
Just skill and steel and how you move,
Shardplate strut, get in the groove,

[chorus]
Duelist, duelist, come and face me,
Duelist, duelist, can't erase me,
On the dance floor of the arena,
I'm the prince, you've never seen a
Blade that cuts and feet that slide,
Shardplate disco, step inside,
Duelist! Let's go!

[verse 2]
Renar? Took his plate in round three,
Sadeas' champions? They can't stop me,
Father says the duels are frivolous,
But Father doesn't feel the stimulus
Of ten thousand people on their feet,
The roar that turns the battle to a beat,
I fight for Bridge Four's honor and my name,
But honestly? I love the game,

[chorus]
Duelist, duelist, come and face me,
Duelist, duelist, can't erase me,
On the dance floor of the arena,
I'm the prince, you've never seen a
Blade that cuts and feet that slide,
Shardplate disco, step inside,
Duelist! Let's go!

[bridge - funk breakdown]
Stance one, two, three, four,
Blade meets plate on the dance floor,
Stance five, six, seven, eight,
Shardbearer's disco, don't be late,

[outro]
Bow to the crowd, salute the fallen,
Adolin Kholin, and I'm still balling

tracks.title: Golden Boy
tracks.prompt: pop-rock funk disco fusion, glossy and self-aware: synth-pop sheen with funk bass and The Killers' desert rock guitar, 115 BPM driving, male vocal charming but increasingly vulnerable beneath the polish, disco strings meeting power pop hooks, handclaps and tambourine, Daft Punk production polish with Killers emotional honesty
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Golden hair, golden plate, golden reputation,
Highprince's son, the pride of the Kholin nation,
Fashion forward, fourteen courtships deep,
They think the surface is all there is to keep,
But underneath the swagger and the style,
A son who'd walk a thousand miles
To see his father smile at him just once,
Not at the soldier, at the son,

[chorus]
Golden boy, golden boy,
Every expectation's golden toy,
Dance, dance, dance through the pain,
Golden boy, do it again,
Smile for the crowd, shine for the throne,
Golden boy never feels alone,
(But he does, but he does)

[verse 2]
Renarin's the genius they don't see,
I'm the showman, that's the deal with me,
Every handshake, every bow, rehearsed,
Prince Adolin, for better or for worse,
Shallan sees through it, that's the thing,
She sketches what's beneath the golden king,
A boy who lost his mother young,
And learned to smile before he learned to mourn,

[chorus]
Golden boy, golden boy,
Every expectation's golden toy,
Dance, dance, dance through the pain,
Golden boy, do it again,
Smile for the crowd, shine for the throne,
Golden boy never feels alone,
(But he does, but he does)

[bridge - stripped to bass and vocal]
I'm not the Blackthorn, I'm not the Bondsmith,
I'm not the Radiant, I'm not the myth,
I'm just Adolin, is that enough?
I'm just Adolin, I'm just enough,

[outro - full groove returns]
Golden boy puts the mask back on,
And dances until the feeling's gone

tracks.title: Sadeas Falls
tracks.prompt: pop-rock funk disco fusion, dark turn: the funk groove from previous tracks playing normally then cutting to DEAD SILENCE for the murder, 118 BPM that stops completely, when music returns it's minor key with distorted funk bass and haunted pop-rock guitar, male vocal shifting from anger to horror to resolve, Talking Heads' anxiety meets Joy Division's darkness
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1 - normal groove]
Sadeas smiled at me in the corridor,
That smile that sent my father's men to war,
The man who used Bridge Four as human shields,
Who'd burn the world to own the fields,
He talked of politics, of future plans,
The coalition crumbling in his hands,
And something in me simply broke,

[the groove stops dead]

[verse 2 - sparse, minor key]
I stabbed him through the eye,
I didn't plan to, I won't lie,
The golden boy with blood on golden hands,
Standing over a body no one understands,
Shallan found me there, she didn't flinch,
Hid the body, inch by inch,
My secret and her secret, bound in red,
The prince who danced now dances with the dead,

[chorus - haunted groove]
Sadeas falls and the music stops,
Sadeas falls and the dancing stops,
The disco ball still spins but no one's there,
Just a golden boy with blood in his hair,
Did I do right? Did I do wrong?
The silence stretches, the silence is long,

[verse 3]
Father would be horrified, I know,
Kaladin would understand, though,
The math that Jasnah does with words,
I did with a knife, absurd,
But Sadeas would have killed them all,
Every bridgeman, every thrall,
So the golden boy made a choice in the dark,
And the music carries a different mark,

[chorus]
Sadeas falls and the music stops,
Sadeas falls and the dancing stops,
But slowly, slowly, the beat comes back,
A different rhythm on a darker track,

[outro - beat returns, changed]
I am not sorry,
I am not sorry,
But I am changed

tracks.title: Maya
tracks.prompt: pop-rock funk disco fusion, resurrection anthem: starting with broken distorted sounds representing a deadeye spren, gradually the funk bass returns note by note, the pop-rock guitars warm up from cold to bright, 110 BPM building to 125, male vocal tender and encouraging at first then joyful as the beat fully returns, the sound of a dead instrument coming back to life, disco groove resurrection, the most emotionally cathartic track
tracks.lyrics:
[intro - broken sounds, static]
Ma...ya...
Her name is Maya,

[verse 1 - minimal, building]
Every Shardblade is a corpse,
A spren killed by broken oaths, of course,
I've been swinging a dead woman's soul,
And I didn't know, I didn't know,
But in Shadesmar I saw her eyes,
Scratched and vacant, no disguise,
Deadeye, they call them, gone and done,
But Maya, Maya, reached for the sun,

[chorus - groove returning]
Maya, Maya, come back to me,
Maya, Maya, the beat returns, you see,
The rhythm's healing, the funk revives,
Maya, Maya, the dance survives,
Come back, come back, come back to life,
The music never really dies,

[verse 2 - fuller]
They said deadeyes can't recover,
They said the bond is done forever,
But I talked to her, every day I tried,
Not with oaths but with honest pride,
In who she was before I held the Blade,
In the cultivationspren that she was made,
And slowly, slowly, one word at a time,
Maya spoke through the paradigm,

[chorus - full groove]
Maya, Maya, come back to me,
Maya, Maya, the beat returns, you see,
The rhythm's healing, the funk revives,
Maya, Maya, the dance survives,
Come back, come back, come back to life,
The music never really dies!

[bridge - Maya's voice breaking through]
We! Chose!
(The Radiants didn't kill us)
We! Chose!
(We chose to die for Roshar)

[final chorus - maximum groove, celebration]
Maya lives! The dance floor lights!
Maya lives! The golden knight
Didn't need an oath to resurrect,
Just love and stubborn disrespect
For every rule that said she's gone,
Maya, Maya, dance on, dance on!

[outro]
The beat comes back,
It always comes back,
Maya, dance with me

tracks.title: Kholin's Finest
tracks.prompt: pop-rock funk disco fusion, triumphant celebration: full arena pop-rock with Daft Punk disco production at maximum joy, 128 BPM peak energy, horn section and disco strings with crunchy rock guitar, male vocal at peak charisma and genuine happiness, group backing vocals for the crew, confetti-cannon energy, bass-heavy funk breakdown in bridge, massive singalong finale
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Not the Blackthorn, not the Bondsmith's heir,
Not Radiant, and I don't care,
Because I've got a spren who chose to live,
I've got a love with more than I can give,
I've got a brother who sees the future's shape,
And a father who finally learned to drape
His arm around his sons and say,
I'm proud of you, each and every day,

[chorus]
Kholin's finest on the floor tonight,
Adolin Kholin and we're feeling right,
No Shards needed, no oaths required,
Just heart and soul and funk-inspired,
Dance! For Bridge Four and the crew,
Dance! For everything we've been through,
Kholin's finest, that's the name,
And we will never be the same!

[verse 2]
Shallan's sketching portraits on the wall,
Kaladin's actually smiling through it all,
Father's dancing, storms, he's dancing bad,
But it's the most beautiful thing I've ever had,
Maya manifests beside me, green and bright,
A cultivationspren returning to the light,
The golden boy's not golden anymore,
He's something real, something worth fighting for,

[chorus]
Kholin's finest on the floor tonight,
Adolin Kholin and we're feeling right,
No Shards needed, no oaths required,
Just heart and soul and funk-inspired,
Dance! For Bridge Four and the crew,
Dance! For everything we've been through,
Kholin's finest, that's the name,
And we will never be the same!

[bridge - funk breakdown]
Maya! (Dance!)
Shallan! (Dance!)
Kaladin! (Smile!)
Dalinar! (Try!)
Renarin! (Shine!)
Bridge Four! (DANCE!)

[outro - singalong]
Life before death, dance before dawn,
Strength before weakness, groove before gone,
Journey before destination, but enjoy the ride,
Kholin's finest, side by side,
Kholin's finest, side by side!
